creator: King
descriptionHtml:
In this unique RPG, join Embla in her epic fight to stop the end of all worlds and establish her as one of Solgard’s most legendary heroes.
Use strategy to battle hordes of ice enemies, claim bounties on legendary villains, defeat epic Bosses and win the war against evil to become a true legend of Solgard.

❄️ RAGNAROK IS COMING
Battle with epic fantasy creatures, summon legendary Gods from the Norse mythology to defeat monstrous bosses and win the war against an endless winter.
Use Tactics and Strategy to combat your enemies and shutter all the ice vortexes.

🔥 BECOME SOLGARD’S BEST HOPE
Action your RPG skills and fight in the Hero Arena.

👊 UNITE FORCES AND MASTER RPG TACTICS
Build guilds with other players, discuss your RPG tactics, fight together to battle epic Guild Bosses and win legendary treasures.

🌎 ADVENTURE IN FIVE LEGENDARY LANDS
Collect allies and defeat monsters from all 5 realms of Solgard.

⚡️ HONE YOUR POWER
Grow and power up your hero and army to conquer your opponents.

The war to prevent Ragnarok has begun and each battle will require your best strategy.
Are you ready to jump in the arena, fight epic battles and enter the pantheon of Solgard’s ancient heroes? Download this RPG now and be part of the legend!

Legend of Solgard is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
By downloading this app on your mobile you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

You must be connected to the Internet to access full game features.

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet.

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

descriptionShort: New RPG quest to fight legendary heroes, collect & build your army!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Smash open the doors to World 5: NIFLHEIM. New strategies, new levels, and new enemies. Let’s kick some ice!
Introducing Spellcrafting. Five new spells can be earned along with Sun Spear (which will need to be powered up). Consumables & mastery ingredients found in free/daily chests. Join the FB group for more details!
Improved idol UI: Sort, compare, see all eligible creatures.
Coming soon: The Heimdall Blót. Introducing Heimdall, Welkin, and the Rattle Mage.

title: Legend of Solgard

creator: Snowprint Studios AB
descriptionHtml:
In this unique RPG, join Embla in her epic fight to stop the end of all worlds and establish her as one of Solgard’s most legendary heroes.
Use strategy to battle hordes of ice enemies, claim bounties on legendary villains, defeat epic Bosses and win the war against evil to become a true legend of Solgard.

❄️ RAGNAROK IS COMING
Battle with epic fantasy creatures, summon legendary Gods from the Norse mythology to defeat monstrous bosses and win the war against an endless winter.
Use Tactics and Strategy to combat your enemies and shutter all the ice vortexes.

🔥 BECOME SOLGARD’S BEST HOPE
Action your RPG skills and fight in the Hero Arena.

👊 UNITE FORCES AND MASTER RPG TACTICS
Build guilds with other players, discuss your RPG tactics, fight together to battle epic Guild Bosses and win legendary treasures.

🌎 ADVENTURE IN FIVE LEGENDARY LANDS
Collect allies and defeat monsters from all 5 realms of Solgard.

⚡️ HONE YOUR POWER
Grow and power up your hero and army to conquer your opponents.

The war to prevent Ragnarok has begun and each battle will require your best strategy.
Are you ready to jump in the arena, fight epic battles and enter the pantheon of Solgard’s ancient heroes? Download this RPG now and be part of the legend!

Legend of Solgard is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
By downloading this app on your mobile you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://www.snowprintstudios.com/en/snowprint-studios-terms-of-service/

You must be connected to the Internet to access full game features.

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s New
We’re getting ready for the Norns Blót! This festival features our old friends Norns, Heimdall, Moon Mage, Sun Mage, and Bog Mage. All of those creatures have been improved, so check them out!
One new friend joins the fun: a green, common beast named Beetling.
In the Underworld, Hel is now more likely to imprison your lower rarity creatures.
Bug fixes and optimizations

title: Legend of Solgard

creator: Snowprint Studios AB
descriptionHtml:
In this unique RPG, join Embla in her epic fight to stop the end of all worlds and establish her as one of Solgard’s most legendary heroes.
Use strategy to battle hordes of ice enemies, claim bounties on legendary villains, defeat epic Bosses and win the war against evil to become a true legend of Solgard.

❄️ RAGNAROK IS COMING
Battle with epic fantasy creatures, summon legendary Gods from the Norse mythology to defeat monstrous bosses and win the war against an endless winter.
Use Tactics and Strategy to combat your enemies and shutter all the ice vortexes.

🔥 BECOME SOLGARD’S BEST HOPE
Action your RPG skills and fight in the Hero Arena.

👊 UNITE FORCES AND MASTER RPG TACTICS
Build guilds with other players, discuss your RPG tactics, fight together to battle epic Guild Bosses and win legendary treasures.

🌎 ADVENTURE IN FIVE LEGENDARY LANDS
Collect allies and defeat monsters from all 5 realms of Solgard.

⚡️ HONE YOUR POWER
Grow and power up your hero and army to conquer your opponents.

The war to prevent Ragnarok has begun and each battle will require your best strategy.
Are you ready to jump in the arena, fight epic battles and enter the pantheon of Solgard’s ancient heroes? Download this RPG now and be part of the legend!

Legend of Solgard is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
By downloading this app on your mobile you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://www.snowprintstudios.com/en/snowprint-studios-terms-of-service/

You must be connected to the Internet to access full game features.

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet.

descriptionShort: New RPG quest to fight legendary heroes, collect & build your army!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s New
- Get ready for Festival 20: The Brokk Blót, featuring new Mythical creatures Brokk and Fadeling.
- Introducing the Buy/Sell/Craft system! Turn excess items you don’t want into gold, and learn to craft items you do want.
- Mode shops changes to support the new system.
- Fixes for Sunspine, Rotbite, Redguard, and Sun Mage.
- Be sure to check our Discord for the full patch notes.

title: Legend of Solgard

creator: Snowprint Studios AB
descriptionHtml:
In this unique RPG, join Embla in her epic fight to stop the end of all worlds and establish her as one of Solgard’s most legendary heroes.
Use strategy to battle hordes of ice enemies, claim bounties on legendary villains, defeat epic Bosses and win the war against evil to become a true legend of Solgard.

❄️ RAGNAROK IS COMING
Battle with epic fantasy creatures, summon legendary Gods from the Norse mythology to defeat monstrous bosses and win the war against an endless winter.
Use Tactics and Strategy to combat your enemies and shutter all the ice vortexes.

🔥 BECOME SOLGARD’S BEST HOPE
Action your RPG skills and fight in the Hero Arena.

👊 UNITE FORCES AND MASTER RPG TACTICS
Build guilds with other players, discuss your RPG tactics, fight together to battle epic Guild Bosses and win legendary treasures.

🌎 ADVENTURE IN FIVE LEGENDARY LANDS
Collect allies and defeat monsters from all 5 realms of Solgard.

⚡️ HONE YOUR POWER
Grow and power up your hero and army to conquer your opponents.

The war to prevent Ragnarok has begun and each battle will require your best strategy.
Are you ready to jump in the arena, fight epic battles and enter the pantheon of Solgard’s ancient heroes? Download this RPG now and be part of the legend!

Legend of Solgard is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
By downloading this app on your mobile you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://www.snowprintstudios.com/en/snowprint-studios-terms-of-service/

Use strategy to battle hordes of ice enemies, claim bounties on legendary villains, defeat epic Bosses and win the war against evil to become a true legend of Solgard.

❄️ RAGNAROK IS COMING
Battle with epic fantasy creatures, summon legendary Gods from the Norse mythology to defeat monstrous bosses and win the war against an endless winter.
Use Tactics and Strategy to combat your enemies and shutter all the ice vortexes.

🔥 BECOME SOLGARD’S BEST HOPE
Action your RPG skills and fight in the Hero Arena.

👊 UNITE FORCES AND MASTER RPG TACTICS
Build guilds with other players, discuss your RPG tactics, fight together to battle epic Guild Bosses and win legendary treasures.

🌎 ADVENTURE IN FIVE LEGENDARY LANDS
Collect allies and defeat monsters from all 5 realms of Solgard.

⚡️ HONE YOUR POWER
Grow and power up your hero and army to conquer your opponents.

The war to prevent Ragnarok has begun and each battle will require your best strategy.
Are you ready to jump in the arena, fight epic battles and enter the pantheon of Solgard’s ancient heroes? Download this RPG now and be part of the legend!

Legend of Solgard is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
By downloading this app on your mobile you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://www.snowprintstudios.com/en/snowprint-studios-terms-of-service/

You must be connected to the Internet to access full game features.

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet.
